messages.subject: another keeper!
messages.msgSnippet: I never knew that parenting could be like it is in my house.  I thought there was always an innate sense of distrust and it was a crap shoot whether you even
messages.messageBody:
"I never knew that parenting could be like it is in my house. I thought
there
was always an innate sense of distrust and it was a crap shoot whether you
even LIKED, much less loved your own child."

So says Glena.
Oh, no! Now I am going to have to start keeping some Glena quotes also!
Beautifully put, Glena.
Aloha, Lee
